response.original_title: The Bittersweet History of Fun Home on Broadway
response.overview: By all accounts, Fun Home never stood a chance on Broadway. It was a unorthodox story with a meager budget and a tiny theater. So did Fun Home defy the odds to become a smash? And what can this story tell us about the future of Broadway and society as a whole?
response.title: The Bittersweet History of Fun Home on Broadway
